verbose_text: Sonoyama et al induced the osteo / odontogenic differentiation of SCAP by using basic culture medium (alpha-MEM and 15% FBS) plus 10 nmol/l dexamethasone, 10 mmol/l beta-glycerophosphate, 50 mug/ml ascorbate phosphate, and 10 nmol/l 1,25 dihydroxyvitamin D3.
evidence: al induced the osteo/odontogenic differentiation of SCAP
